name: Don't Sweat It!
description:
Don't Sweat It! was created for the itch.io Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Jam. The theme was "Present", which I interpreted as a game in which you control a character giving a presentation to a boardroom full of lifeless decision makers.

Let's synergize!

Controls: left and right cursor keys, or tap the screen to move.

Mute and fullscreen buttons are at the bottom corners.

Tools used: Construct 2, Aseprite, BeepBox, Bfxr
